graphs.query: event.category contains '' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by event.category | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Category

graphs.query: event.category='indicators' | group count=count() by indicator.category | sort - count
graphs.title: Indicators by Category

graphs.query: event.category='file' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by timestamp=timebucket('1h'), event.type | transpose event.type on timestamp
graphs.title: File Activity Over Time

graphs.query: event.category='process' dataSource.category='security' | group distinct_spawned=estimate_distinct(tgt.process.user) by src.process.user | sort -distinct_spawned | limit 10
graphs.title: Top Process Spawners

graphs.query: event.category='ip' event.network.direction='OUTGOING' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by src.process.name, dst.ip.address | sort -count | limit 10
graphs.title: Top Outgoing Connections
